title: 04/29/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/29/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, it’s an NFL Draft special with DP and the guys. Daniel Jeremiah joined the show in the first hour to run through a mock phone call between the 49ers and a scout as well as giving his preview to the rest of the night. Chargers running back Austin Ekeler called in to talk about the first time he met Phillip Rivers’ family and throwing up in the huddle during his first NFL game. Lastly, Projected 1st round pick Trey Lance joined us to talk about whether he knows where he's going tonight.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, it’s an NFL Draft special with DP and the guys. Daniel Jeremiah joined the show in the first hour to run through a mock phone call between the 49ers and a scout as well as giving his preview to the rest of the night. Chargers running back Austin Ekeler called in to talk about the first time he met Phillip Rivers’ family and throwing up in the huddle during his first NFL game. Lastly, Projected 1st round pick Trey Lance joined us to talk about whether he knows where he's going tonight.
